title: "Goldfinger" movie poster font please help...
content:
I apologize ahead of time for insults to anyone's intelligence, I really SHOULD know this one, but if you could ID this it would be greatly appreciated.

thanks in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131215012305im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Goldfinger_3493.jpg)
author: jam

comments.content:
Looks like a condensed Clarendon to me but I can't find anything that bold or that condensed.

If it's a vintage poster the font may not be available digitally.
Looks a lot like [Giza](http://web.archive.org/web/20131215012305/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/Giza/styles "Giza styles") to me

It's predigital, so a match isn't certain. [Egiziano](http://web.archive.org/web/20131215012305/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=C.106292.0.0&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=GOLDFINGER&sampleSize=32) (wider) and [Behemoth](http://web.archive.org/web/20131215012305/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=C.106317.0.0&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=GOLDFINGER&sampleSize=42) are close.
Maybe ATBehemoth-Semi Condensed, see MyFonts specimen

you know what... I think that's the one I was trying to think of.

thank you for all your help, you guys are the best.
